ygData.subject: Re: cant hit melee thing
ygData.msgSnippet: I can see your point, but I don t think Verant intended for people to be grouping with party members to are that far apart in Levels.  Otherwise, what s to
ygData.messageBody:
I can see your point, but I don't think Verant intended for people to be
grouping with party members to are that far apart in Levels. Otherwise,
what's to stop us from grouping with 40+ levelers and going after Giants and
Dragons! :) Yeah, damn exciting...but pointless. ;)

My understanding is that the farther up in levels we go...the wider range we
can group up with people. It may not be out of the question for a level 40
PC to group with a 30 PC probably. At 18 now, I've noticed it's still a
pretty even challenge for everybody even 5 levels above me. xp gains is
still fairly even although the high-level player in the group would probably
forfeit a few xp by killing things that might be conning green to him/her.

At lower teens, I've noticed that it was usually better to stick between 3
levels.

Just my observation, not a science. :)
-- Lim'Dul

>Message: 4
Date: Wed, 2 Jun 1999 18:19:45 -0400
From: "shypht" <evanschu@...>
>Subject: All players and the 6 lvl resist / cant hit melee thing.

>To me, it seams like alot of people assume that though all lvls of the game
>we
>group with people that are generally the same level as eachother. But, this
>is
>fale. I have grouped with people upto 7 - 8 lvls above me, for fun, and for
>some
>exp since I can still usualy get a worth while ammount of exp while grouped
>with
>them. And this is where the "resistance" complaint comes in.
